👏 Thanks to all who submitted questions. More takeovers from FIFA Legends coming 🔜. https://t.co/6WuqePeBa4 Q: Who was your childhood football idol? And who was the best player that you played with? #LegendTakeover (@donirezn)

🗣 @ojuliocesar_12: My idol was Taffarel. As a child, he truly inspired me and made me want to be like him. And the best I’ve played with was @10Ronaldinho. Q: When will Inter win Serie A again? And what do you think of Samir Handanovic? Is he as good as you were? #LegendTakeover (@adwiwahyono)

🗣 @ojuliocesar_12: I love @Inter_en. I love the fans. 🖤💙👇 https://t.co/rcO3wUmjNT Q: Vlachodimos tem qualidade para atingir o nível de Oblak, Ederson e... Júlio César? #LegendTakeover (@Onssaponathaime)

🗣 @ojuliocesar_12: Tem mostrado qualidade demais e não tenho dúvidas de que pode, sim, chegar ao nível dos maiores goleiros do Benfica nos últimos tempos. Q: Who was the best goalkeeper you faced over your playing career? #LegendTakeover (@DolfiThomas)

🗣 @ojuliocesar_12 praises @gianluigibuffon 🇮🇹👇 https://t.co/k8sIxbuacC Q: What was your experience like with Toronto FC in MLS & what kind of future do you see for the league? #LegendTakeover (@TheRavingTimes)

🗣 @ojuliocesar_12: Though I spent only 3 months in MLS, it is clearly a very organised and very professional league. Q: What were your best saves with Inter & Brazil? #LegendTakeover (@suliman75664)

🗣@ojuliocesar_12: For Brazil, for sure the penalty kick shoot-out against Chile in the 2014 World Cup. For Inter, a Messi shot in the 2010 Champions League semi-final. Important, beautiful moment. Q: What is your best football moment? #LegendTakeover (@sm__013)

🗣@ojuliocesar_12 on playing in the #WorldCup & winning the @ChampionsLeague with @Inter_en 👇 https://t.co/dG13SwF4Rt Q: Who do you think should be or who would you like to see as the next Inter goalkeeper after Handanović? #LegendTakeover (@RyanReginald2)

🗣 @ojuliocesar_12: Inter are already on the way to it with Gabriel Brazão, a young Brazilian goalkeeper they signed and who’s now on loan. Q: How does it feel to be the best goalkeeper in Flamengo history? #LegendTakeover (@eric_crf27)

🗣 @ojuliocesar_12:  I don’t consider myself to be the best goalkeeper in the history of @Flamengo. But I’m very, very proud of what I did when I wore the colours of my beloved team. Q: Who has been the best striker you’ve ever had to encounter? #LegendTakeover (@Theguy1230)

🗣 @ojuliocesar_12: Has to be Romário. No one could make decisions as quickly as he did. The best inside the box. 🗣 @ojuliocesar_12 on his @premierleague days with @QPR 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿 https://t.co/v9FqvNpj0R https://t.co/7f76wOvjkZ 🇧🇷 @ojuliocesar_12's takeover starts NOW. 🔛
